'''Nakul''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Dormitory Block]], [[Fortress of Meropide]], [[Fontaine]].
<!-- Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player AMOUNT_AS_WORD [[Item]]. -->

==Profile==
Nakul is a researcher in [[Meropide]] that is reading a collection of papers from Caterpillar.

===Appearance===
Nakul wears the green robes of the [[Sumeru Akademiya]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
Available prior to completing [[Scenes from Life in Meropide: Chit-Chat]]

{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Nakul:''' Other fields also have some very interesting research findings...
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing here?
::'''Nakul:''' In the short term, I'm reading the collection of papers gifted to me by the [[Cater|kid in green]]. He is quite intelligent and an interesting character, and I greatly admire him.
:{{DIcon}} About the Fortress of Meropide...
::'''Nakul:''' There's a charm to the place which is hard to explain in only a few words. A mystique combined with a sense of danger, it makes it hard to leave.
::'''Nakul:''' I can't say what the best choice is, but I find the examples of those people determined to stay here a bit frightening.
:{{DIcon}} Thanks for your time.
::'''Nakul:''' My pleasure. For me, being able to talk with the people here is always of benefit.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
Available after completing [[Scenes from Life in Meropide: Chit-Chat]]

{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Nakul:''' Forget about the difficult tasks, and focus on the ones there's still hope of completing...
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing here?
::'''Nakul:''' For now, bargaining with [[Carranza]]. But he's too stubborn. I might already get all the materials I need to leave Fontaine before I manage to win him over.
:{{DIcon}} About the Fortress of Meropide...
::'''Nakul:''' There's a charm to the place which is hard to explain in only a few words. A mystique combined with a sense of danger, it makes it hard to leave.
::'''Nakul:''' I can't say what the best choice is, but I find the examples of those people determined to stay here a bit frightening.
:{{DIcon}} About a certain someone...
::'''Nakul:''' There are some tasks in this world that simply cannot be completed. Should you encounter one, the best thing to do is give up as soon as possible.
:{{DIcon}} Thanks for your time.
::'''Nakul:''' My pleasure. For me, being able to talk with the people here is always of benefit.
{{Dialogue End}}
